contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 4, 2003 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Andy Parks - solo cornet, RAF St. Athan. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 8 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2015, 1:13 a.m. July 3, 2020, 9:50 p.m.
1 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland
2 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
3 Tylorstown Band Leigh Phillips
4 Cwmbran Band Neil Watson
5 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
6 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Ron Williams
7 Lewis Merthyr Band Mike Faro
8 Ebbw Vale Band Lyndon Price
